hackathon-requirements:
You will be asked to create an app that delivers a new or improved custoemer/employee experiences that positively impact the business through IoT.
Specifics will be announced at the event.
Finished products should be a working prototype that uses Bluemix in some form or fashion that could lead to an MVP (viable product).
hackathon-rules: Rules will be discussed at the event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team is admitted to  including $25k, POC, MVP, mentorship, increase in valuation, etc.
Your Hackathon participation gets you automatic admission to ITP16 – ITP16 badges will be distributed on Sunday, Dec 4, 2016
Up to $120k USD of IBM Cloud Credits for Winning Team
3 Months FREE Bluemix – Awarded to top 3 teams

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=225 E Las Olas Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301, USA
hackathon-location-address: 225 E Las Olas Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301, USA
hackathon-description-header: You've got 48 hours to hack your way to a real-world IoT solution.
